text: allaah ne inakaar karanevaalon ke lie nooh kee stree aur loot kee stree kee misaal pesh kee hai. ve hamaare bandon mein se do nek bandon ke adheen theen. kintu un donon striyon ne unase vishvaasaghaat kiya to allaah ke muqaabale mein unake kuchh kaam na aa sake aur kah diya gaya, "pravesh karanevaalon ke saath donon aag mein pravisht ho jao.
